com.cloudofficeprint.Resources

Class Template

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudofficeprint.Resources.Resource
      • com.cloudofficeprint.Resources.Template

  • public class Template
extends Resource
    Class for a template resource. A template has extra optional options, like delimiters and template hash. To create a Template, use the static from methods.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      • getJSONForSecondaryFile

        public com.google.gson.JsonObject getJSONForSecondaryFile()
        Needs to be used to get the JSON of a resource for a secondary file (file to prepend, to append, to insert or subtemplate), because their JSON has a different format then for a template.
        Specified by:
        getJSONForSecondaryFile in class Resource
        Returns:
        JsonObject to add in the JSON for the server.

      • fromBase64

        public static Template fromBase64(java.lang.String filetype,
                                  java.lang.String database64)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a new instance of a Template from base64.
        Parameters:
        filetype - Type (extension) of the template e.g. : docx (not docx. !).
        database64 - Data of the template base64 encoded.
        Returns:
        Template created from base64.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the mimetype is not found.

      • fromLocalFile

        public static Template fromLocalFile(java.lang.String filePath)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a new instance of a Template from a local file.
        Parameters:
        filePath - Path of the local file.
        Returns:
        Template created from a local file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If file not found.
        java.lang.Exception - If the extension of the file is not found.
        java.lang.Exception - If the mimetype is not found.

      • fromHTML

        public static Template fromHTML(java.lang.String HTML,
                                java.lang.Boolean landscape)
        Create a new instance of a Template from HTML.
        Parameters:
        HTML - data for this template.
        landscape - Whether the HTML should be rendered as landscape-oriented page (default :false)
        Returns:
        Template created from HTML.

      • fromServerPath

        public static Template fromServerPath(java.lang.String path,
                                      java.lang.String mimeType)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a new instance of a Template from a path on the Cloud Office Print server.
        Parameters:
        path - Path of the file on the Cloud Office Print server.
        mimeType - Mimetype of the file on the Cloud Office Print server.
        Returns:
        Template created from a path on the Cloud Office Print server.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if mimetype can't be deduced.
        java.lang.Exception - if extension can't be deduced.

      • fromURL

        public static Template fromURL(java.lang.String URL,
                               java.lang.String filetype,
                               java.lang.String mimeType)
        Create a new instance of a Template from a URL.
        Parameters:
        URL - of the template.
        filetype - extension of the template.
        mimeType - of the template.
        Returns:
        Template created from a URL.
